articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: Apple will update iOS notification summaries after BBC headline mistake - Ars Technica
articles.description: It’s unfortunately not possible for Apple Intelligence to make zero errors.

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: AMD unveils new chips for laptops, desktops, and gaming handhelds at CES 2025 - TechCrunch
articles.description: At CES 2025 in Las Vegas, AMD unveiled a slew of new chips destined for devices ranging from desktops to gaming handhelds.
articles.content:
At CES 2025 in Las Vegas, AMD unveiled a slew of new chips destined for devices ranging from desktops to gaming handhelds.
AMD is riding high coming into this year’s CES. The company commanded a 28.… [+4370 chars]
